programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Dion track progress on renovations in Bristol and Blackley.

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip
programme.desc: Staying in what was one of Naples' poorest neighbourhoods - in a hotel that's also an art gallery - Clive discovers how this always-colourful city is changing for the better. As a big fan of opera, Clive is also excited to join the cast of the Teatro San Carlo opera house in the run up to their opening night, and while in the costume department, he just can't resist trying a few things on...

programme.title: Coast to Coast Food Festival
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Edith Bowman are on a journey of international food discovery as they take in Belfast's Mela festival, discovering how to make cheap and easy kimchi and authentic Jamaican patties. Baker Briony-May Williams finds out why Cumbria is the home of sticky toffee pudding. Farmer Meinir Howells gets a workout harvesting cockles in Carmarthenshire, and farmer Jim Smith raises a glass to non-alcoholic beer, wine and spirits.

programme.title: Coastal Defenders
programme.desc: The Coastal Defenders team face one of their smallest but fiercest challenges -mussels. These small but deadly shellfish have blocked the pipes of a huge vessel, stalling it in dock. The divers must blast the mussels out of their hiding places to allow the ship to sail once more.

programme.title: Nicky Campbell BBC News Talk
programme.desc: Nicky Campbell takes your calls on the day's talking points, hearing views and experiences from across the UK. Call 08085 909693 between 9am and 11am on weekdays (calls are free from mobiles and landlines).

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A suivre, les dernières actualités présentées par les équipes rédactionnelles de la BBC, le très réputé radiodiffuseur du service public britannique. Créée en 1922 à Londres, la British Broadcast Corporation est connue pour être la plus ancienne société diffusant des programmes de radio ou de télévision au monde.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Join presenter Jo Coburn as she discusses the latest political news and stories in a conversational format, covering the comings-and-goings from Westminster in the BBC's daily politics programme. Featuring opinions and arguments from all the sides of the political spectrum, the show invites informed and opinionated guests to share their views on the stories of the day.

programme.title: The Super League Show
programme.desc: Pas de description

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Game show in which players must avoid giving impossible answers to a set of questions.

programme.title: Eggheads
programme.desc: General knowledge quiz featuring probably the greatest quiz team in Britain.

programme.title: Au coeur du cosmos
programme.desc: Sur Terre, les espèces animales et végétales ou les civilisations sont appelées à disparaître, comme le sont, dans l'univers, les étoiles et les nébuleuses lointaines : enquête sur ce phénomène.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: The sewers make bras and knickers and fit luxury pyjamas to their models.

programme.title: Flog It !
programme.desc: Flog It! comes from the heart of Birmingham and its historic museum and art gallery.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher, Louise Minchin, Chris Washington and Kimberly Wyatt test their trivia.

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip
programme.desc: Clive heads north from Lazio's capital, Rome, to the dramatic valleys of Italy's badlands, out of which rise the fairy-tale citadel of Civita di Bagnoregio - Lazio's ghost town. Meeting one of the 20 remaining residents, Clive finds out what it's like to be outnumbered by a million annual visitors, and he explores the ancient tunnels beneath the town to discover why it's slowly crumbling to dust

programme.title: Les motards poilus : Cooking Trip en Méditerranée
programme.desc: David Myers et Simon King, reprennent du service ! Direction la Méditerranée, pour une aventure gourmande gorgée de soleil. Cette fois-ci, les motards poilus partiront à la découverte des saveurs authentiques de cette fameuse cuisine méditerranéenne en se rendant en Italie, en traversant les îles Baléares pour terminer leur food trip sur les côtes espagnoles.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Saison 7 Episode 9 Gregg Wallace visits a factory with a menthol scent. The UK consumes around 19,000 tonnes of mints every year, and the Polos factory in York produces 32 million every single day. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits the largest sugar beet factory in Europe and helps to bring in the harvest on one of the last surviving peppermint farms in the UK. And Ruth Goodman explores the clever marketing that persuaded many people to purchase minty mouthwash. Année de réalisation : 2022

programme.title: Turkey: Empire of Erdogan
programme.desc: Erdogan's rise to power and how his initial popularity turns to mass protests against him.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and trade union leaders.

programme.title: Eclair de lune
programme.desc: Loretta Castorini, une jeune veuve, cache un tempérament fantasque et passionné derrière une allure sage et réservée. Après la disparition prématurée de son mari, elle est retournée vivre chez les siens, à Brooklyn, et a renoncé à toute fréquentation masculine. Au bout de sept ans, pour rompre une solitude pesante, elle accepte la proposition de mariage d'un respectable quinquagénaire bedonnant, Johnny Cammareri, d'origine italienne. Tandis qu'il s'envole vers la Sicile afin d'arracher la bénédiction de son imposante "mamma", il charge Loretta d'inviter au mariage son jeune frère, Ronny, avec lequel il est brouillé depuis des années. Celui-ci est plus jeune et plus séduisant que le futur époux, et la jeune femme ne tarde pas à tomber sous le charme... Année de réalisation : 1987

programme.title: Pilgrimage: The Road to Santiago
programme.desc: In the medieval city of Coimbra, the group split up. Millie, Su, Vickie, Shane and Bobby visit the St Theresa convent and meet a Carmelite nun who served one of the three shepherd children. Nabil finds a mosque for Friday prayers and invites Rita to join him. Keen to connect with her own Jewish culture, Rita seeks out an old synagogue in Tamar and asks Millie to join her. After 14 days and 364 kilometres, the group finally reach the famous Sanctuary of Fatima. Over 70,000 people from around the world gather in the sanctuary to celebrate the reported sighting of the Virgin Mary over 100 years ago.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Nine home cooks recreate their Family Favourite dish for a place in the next round.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The seven remaining cooks face a challenge set by food critic Leyla Kazim.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: This is BBC Two.
